name: Phablecare
description: Phable is on a mission to create an ecosystem of patients, doctors, hospitals, health devices, insurance, and patient care service providers. For patients, we provide a single platform for digitizing prescriptions, personalized health reminders, tracking vitals by syncing with devices from daily steps to blood levels and symptoms.
features: One doctor for one patients supervision
Headline: Make it manageble
ShortDescription: An innovative health assistant serving both patients and doctors.
enhanced_description: Phablecare is an innovative health assistant platform designed to create an integrated ecosystem connecting patients, doctors, hospitals, health devices, insurance providers, and patient care services. It offers a single platform for digitizing prescriptions, providing personalized health reminders, and tracking vital signs by syncing with health devices. Positioned within the Total Rewards category and recognized as Corporate Wellness software and a Health & Safety provider, Phablecare aims to improve employee happiness and engagement by offering comprehensive health and well-being support, including mental healthcare and personalized medical supervision.
key_use_cases: Personalized health tracking and reminders for employees
Access to mental healthcare services for employees
Facilitating one-on-one medical supervision for patients/employees
competitive_advantages: Integrated ecosystem connecting various healthcare stakeholders
Provision of one-on-one doctor supervision for personalized care
Ability to track vitals through syncing with health devices
Single platform for multiple health management features (prescriptions, reminders, vital tracking)
integration_capabilities: Syncing with health devices for vital tracking
